title: Fully Automated Whole-Body Tumor Segmentation on PET/CT using Deep Transfer Learning

abstract: 241979 Introduction: Cancer is a worldwide health concern and the second leading cause of death in the United States. Automatic detection and characterization of cancer are important clinical needs to enable early treatment. We developed a deep …
